body:
Ok, I want to know what is going on. So a bunch of people and I have made maps and they have gotten no notice as far as I can tell. Furthermore, there was even a thread similar to this in Ask the Seniors and that hasn't gotten a response. I get that the Map Devs are busy with Atlas stuff but can you not take 5 minutes to give us your input on our maps?

-Thank You for your time 
DipperPines_12
body_tagged:
Ok, I want to know what is going on. So a bunch of people and I have made maps and they have gotten no notice as far as I can tell. Furthermore, there was even a thread similar to this in Ask the Seniors and that hasn't gotten a response. I get that the Map Devs are busy with Atlas stuff but can you not take 5 minutes to give us your input on our maps?

-Thank You for your time 
DipperPines_12
title: What Is Going On?

replies.body: And forgot to mention. I bumped my map 9 times only to get ONE map dev's opinion. Thanks timeaus btw
replies.body_tagged: And forgot to mention. I bumped my map 9 times only to get ONE map dev's opinion. Thanks timeaus btw

replies.body:
They d̶o̶ ̶n̶o̶t̶ ̶c̶a̶r̶e̶ ̶a̶b̶o̶u̶t̶ ̶i̶t need 2 or 3 y̶e̶a̶r̶s weeks to review your map, but they are s̶l̶o̶t̶h̶s buzy at school (even in summer?) and they are converting o̶u̶r̶ ̶n̶e̶r̶v̶s̶ ̶t̶o̶ ̶m̶a̶d̶n̶e̶s̶s YML to XML last 3 or more months (1 month would be enough, imo).
Don't forget, that they all are k̶i̶d̶s̶ ̶a̶n̶d̶ ̶t̶e̶e̶n̶s volunteers, so they have no r̶e̶s̶p̶o̶n̶s̶i̶b̶i̶l̶i̶t̶y salary for this work.
#procastinationforever

replies.body:
Hi DipperPines_12!
I really enjoy taking a look at your maps!
They are really astounding!
It must have taken quite some time to get those out of your head and putting them in minecraft.
I couldn't do that!
You are really great!
I actually think you should be a MapDev (I think I already told you this)
But anyways, stay strong, and hang in there!
Someone will take notice of you soon! (I REALLY hope!)
Keep up the good work!
Oh, and see you in game!
